title: Boys And Girls

status: 少年少女 ; Shounen Shoujo ; Shounenshoujo ; 少年少女 (NEMU Youko)
description:
Description :
        Hanna goes to her grandpa’s house in the country, and the ring she got from her boyfriend falls into a tank with goldfish. As Hanna tries to get the ring back, a boy passing by calls out to her… Contains 6 stories.1. Shounen Shoujo2. Famires☆Night3. Border Line4. Kenritsu Mammoth Nishi Koutou Gakkou5. Treasure Room6. Aka-Coat no Selma
